testcase.name: 1.1. Checking if the new password that contains no special character will be accepted
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to check if the new password that contains no special character will be accepted. Password wchich not contain special character should be not accepted.
testcase.preconditions:
Application should not allow user to create a new password which not contain a special character.

After a try to create a new password which not contain a special character there sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain a special character

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Fill the fields Password and Confirm Password with the password that not contained special character. Then click button Save
step.expectedresults: There sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain a special character. Application should not save this password

testcase.name: 1.2. Checking if the new password that contains no number will be accepted
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to check if the new password that contains no number will be accepted. Password wchich not contain number should be not accepted.
testcase.preconditions:
Application should not allow user to create a new password which not contain a number.

After a try to create a new password which not contain a number there sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain a number.

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Fill the fields Password and ConfirmPassword with the password that not contained number. Then click button Save
step.expectedresults: There sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain a number. Application should not save this password

testcase.name: 1.3. Checking if the new password shorter than 8 characters will be accepted
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to check if the new password can be shorter than 8 characters. Password wchich not contain at least 8 characters should be not accepted.
testcase.preconditions:
Application should not allow user to create a new password which is shorter than 8 characters.

After a try to create a new password which is shorter than 8 characters there sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain at least 8 characters.

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Fill the fields Password and ConfirmPassword with the password shorter than 8 characters. Then click button Save
step.expectedresults: There sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain at least 8 characters. Application should not save this password

testcase.name: 1.4. Checking if the new password longer than 20 characters will be accepted
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to check if the new password can be longer than 20 characters. Password wchich not contain more than 20 characters should be not accepted.
testcase.preconditions:
Application should not allow user to create a new password which is longer than 20 characters.

After a try to create a new password which is longer than 20 characters there sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain maximum 20 characters.

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Fill the fields Password and ConfirmPassword with the password longer than 20 characters. Then click button Save
step.expectedresults: There sould apear the validation text with information that new password cannot be longer than 20 characters. Application should not save this password

testcase.name: 1.5. Checking if it is possible to save the new password without confirming it
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to test if it is possible to save the new password without confirming it in field 'Confirm password'
testcase.preconditions: Application should not allow user to save the new password without confirming it in field 'Confirm password'. After a try there should appear a validation text with information that user need to confirm password in field "Confirm password'.

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Type new password in field 'Password' , then left the field 'Confirm password' empty and try to save it
step.expectedresults: Application should not allow user to save the password without confirm it. There should appear validation text with information that save new password without confirm it in field "Confirm password' is not possible

testcase.name: 1.6. Checking if data in fields Password and Confirm Password can be different
testcase.summary: This Test case is created in order to test if it is possible to save the password if the data entered in fields 'Password' and 'Confirm password' is different.
testcase.preconditions: Application should not allow to save new password if the data entered in fields 'Password' and 'Confirm password' is different. There should appeared validation text with information that data in field 'Confirm password' need to be same as data in field 'Password'

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Type different data in fields 'Password' and 'Confirm password' then try to save the new password
step.expectedresults: Saving of new password should be not possible. There should appeared validation text with information that data in field 'Confirm password' need to be same as data in field 'Password'

testcase.name: 1.7. Checking if the new password longer than 20 characters will be accepted
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to check if the new password can be longer than 20 characters. Password wchich contain more than 20 characters should be not accepted.
testcase.preconditions:
Application should not allow user to create a new password which is longer than 20 characters.

After a try to create a new password which is longer than 20 characters there sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain maximum 20 characters.

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Fill the fields Password and ConfirmPassword with the password longer than 20 characters. Then click button Save
step.expectedresults: There sould apear the validation text with information that new password must contain maximum 20 characters. Application should not save this password

testcase.name: 1.8. Checking if there is possible to fill the data longer than 20 characters in both fields
testcase.summary: This test case is created in order to check if it is possible to type a data longer than 20 characters in fields 'Password' and 'Confirm password'.
testcase.preconditions: Application should not allow user to type a data longer than 20 characters in fields 'Password' and 'Confirm password'.

step.actions: Run the application for the first time or run and reset data
step.expectedresults: Application should start and ask user to create new password

step.actions: Try to type a data longer than 20 characters in field 'Password'
step.expectedresults: Application should let to type data that contains up to 20 characters in field 'Password'

step.actions: Try to type a data longer than 20 characters in field 'Confirm password'
step.expectedresults: Application should let to type data that contains up to 20 characters in field 'Conform password'
